titleStmt.title: The copy of a letter written by Mr. Thomas Parker, pastor of the church of Newbury in New-England, to his sister, Mrs Elizabeth Avery, sometimes of Newbury in the county of Berks, touching sundry opinions by her professed and maintained. Novemb. 22. 1649. imprimatur John Downame.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Thomas, 1595-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field for Edmund Paxton, at Pauls-Chain, over aginast the Castle Tavern, near the Doctors Commons,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
